greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of cubefree numbers, A004709.
comment: The following four statements are equivalent: m is cubefree; a(m) = 1; m = A004709(k) for some k; A124010(m,k) <= 2 for all k = 1..A001221(m). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 04 2015
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 1 if e<=2, =0 if e>=3. - _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 17 2012
sum(n>0, a(n)/n^s) = product(p prime, 1+p^(-s)+p^(-2s) ) = zeta(s) / zeta(3s). - _Ralf Stephan_, Jul 07 2013
program: | otherwise = cubeFree ps' p (e + 1) x' where (x', r) = divMod x p
(PARI) a(n) = {f = factor(n); for (i=1, #f~, if ((f[i,2]) >=3, return(0));); return (1);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 10 2015
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 27 2012
